item.title: Blogging Using blogdown
item.description: Some quick notes on how this blog was created… It was built using the R blogdown package, which is based on the Hugo static site generator. To get started, I followed Kevin Wong’s excellent tutorial “Blogging with R Markdown”. I decided to host the static site output on GitHub Pages. This should have been easy, but I made a bunch of mistakes along the way because I didn’t read carefully enough.
